alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued December 28 at 4:41AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Gallatin National Forest Avalanche Center in Bozeman has ISSUED an AVALANCHE WARNING which is in effect until 4 AM MST Thursday... * WHAT...Avalanche warning. The avalanche danger is HIGH on all slopes. Natural and human-triggered slides are very likely. * WHERE...Lionhead Area in West Yellowstone, MT and Centennial Mountains in Island Park, ID. * WHEN...Until 4 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...One to two feet of heavy, dense snow and very strong winds have created very dangerous avalanche conditions. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Very dangerous avalanche conditions exist. Backcountry travelers should stay off of steep slopes and stay away from the bottom of steep slopes. Avalanches can be triggered from flat terrain. Steep Slopes can avalanche far above and run into lower angled terrain. Consult www.mtavalanche.com or www.avalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of this or any avalanche center.
